Date: Sunday, 2/16/1988
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Pete Ward
in return for
2B Curtis Arispe, 1B Wilson Corrales, SP Joseph Gelman.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Bay City GM

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Matt McGreevy
Dear Sir,
Matt McGreevy is doing pretty good at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an ERA of 2.27, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Wilmer Bowen
Dear Sir,

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
